mapper.insert: insert into comment_reactions (comment_id, user_id, reaction_type, created_at) values (#{reaction.commentId}, #{reaction.userId}, #{reaction.reactionType}, #{reaction.createdAt})
mapper.delete: delete from comment_reactions where comment_id = #{reaction.commentId} and user_id = #{reaction.userId}
mapper.select: select CR.comment_id commentReactionCommentId, CR.user_id commentReactionUserId, CR.reaction_type commentReactionType, CR.created_at commentReactionCreatedAt from comment_reactions CR where CR.comment_id = #{commentId} and CR.user_id = #{userId}
